item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of March 28, 2023
item.description: As previously announced, we are deprecating the RSS feed. If you would like to subscribe to receive notifications, please visit https://www.databricks.com/legal/legal-subscription

item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of March 18, 2021
item.description: Databricks has added Twilio to improve our customer messaging and Zscaler to enhance our internal corporate security.

item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of November 17, 2020
item.description: Databricks has added EdInvent, Service Rocket and Spektra Systems to expand the offerings of our online training services platform.

item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of April 29, 2020
item.description: Databricks has added Gainsight as a subprocessor for customer relationship management and communications.

item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of February 24, 2020
item.description: Databricks has added Heap as a third party analytics provider for newly created workspaces after February 24, 2020.

item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of April 23, 2019
item.description: Databricks has added Marketo as a third party analytics provider for customer and prospect communications after July 2, 2020.

item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of August 5, 2021
item.description: Databricks has added Okta as an internal identity provider after August 6, 2021

item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of August 5, 2021
item.description: Databricks has added Qualtrics, an enterprise survey platform, to improve the survey experience for users when collecting feedback on our product, services and other offerings after August 6, 2021.

item.title: Databricks Subprocessors as of October 11, 2021
item.description: Databricks has added Microsoft as a third party support channel for Customers who purchase Teams support after October 11, 2021.
